title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in Eclipse with the 'jdt.ui' plugin, the destination package is not correct. The problem occurs specifically when selecting xxx as the destination package.
OB: The destination package after copying is incorrect.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Eclipse IDE with the 'jdt.ui' plugin. 2. Navigate to the package you want to copy. 3. Right-click on the package and select 'Copy'. 4. Right-click on another package or directory and select 'Paste'.
